author: jgm
content: https://ethresear.ch/t/preparing-withdrawals-for-compromised-validator-or-withdrawal-keys-fao-zilm/10453/9 tries to bring together various discussions that have been had on the topic of finding a way for those with compromised seeds/withdrawal keys to be able to regain full control of their validators.  I suggest that all further conversation regarding this topic go to that thread rather than here.
